post.body: we do too! It's just funny to think of all our electronic communication!
Its amazing how much I communicate with my husband @estric via twitter, Text, and IM. I mean, why talk to him?
Did you say "No, why would I do that and wreck a good thing?" LOL :)
Yeah its been a busy morning, I am glad I have it out of the way though. :)How are you??
I thought that preview looked good too! :) I'm looking forward to seeing it!
Ummmm donate to a womens shelter?
:( very sad
yes you do have a nice boyfriend! We are going for appetizers b4 the big movie event. I'm very excited I couldn't sleep! 
:) I have a good boyfriend. And its date night too.
:) happy Thursday to you!! 
I've had days like that!! :)I still do. My 3 year old keeps me on my toes!

good morning!

I'll find something good. :D Promise.
I'll make sure you get it with you tomorrow. :) Promise. Hey wanna watch a movie with me tonight?
You can do it Anne! :)Just be quick!
Oh no - you forgot it??? Thankgoodness you only have an hour to deal. LOL Not two hours like tomorrow night.
Things are good - just getting ready for the holidays. Keeping busy with dance and such - just like you!
you are so good to me Anne!!!

w00t!

hope your having fun - Thea was so proud to have you go

I love avacados! :) I am having cheerios for breakfast. :D Grace would love a fudge breakfast!
ha ha ha I noticed that too - its kinda "cweepy" as Gracie would say!

any bump is nice!

you poor thing!
